name: Rust Query API
description: A versatile API facade for the Hypixel Auction API

API_KEY.description: Key needed to access this API (NOT a Hypixel API key)

POSTGRES_URL.description: Full URL of a PostgreSQL database. Recommended to get a free database from Supabase.

ADMIN_API_KEY.description: Admin key required to use raw SQL parameters. Will default to the API_KEY if not provided.

WEBHOOK_URL.description: A discord webhook URL for logging.

BASE_URL.description: The base URL of the domain. Do not modify this.

FEATURES.description: The features (QUERY, PETS, LOWESTBIN, UNDERBIN, AVERAGE_AUCTION, AVERAGE_BIN) you want enabled separated with a comma.
